entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Snow level 1800 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023
